articles.title: Selim Coskunuzer
articles.contents:
About Me
My name is Selim Coskunuzer. I am a junior at Liberty High School
located in Dallas, Texas. I am passionate about Computer Science and
Machine Learning.
About the Project
I came up with this project idea because I been watching American
football for some time now and I wanted to calculate the difference in
players salaries by their position to see if there was a significant
difference. I hope with this information NFL coaches, fans, etc. can see
that these players will be getting paid more in the future as time goes
on.
Contact Info
Email: scoskunuzer@gmail.com
Github: https://github.com/SelimC06

articles.title: Defensive Positions
articles.contents:
For the Defensive plot I added the 5 most important
positions because If I added all the positions the graph would be too
complicated. From the graph we can interpret that all positions are
getting near equal average salary but the increase and decrease for all
positions is extremely different from each other, for example
Strong Safety increased by 200% in 2016. Also the
lowest average salary in 2020, cornerback, is an important part of the
defensive side but still they are getting paid lower than any other. If
you like to see each player’s salary by year you can interact with the
plot below.

articles.title: Analyzing NFL players Average Salary by Category
articles.description: This project examines the statistics of NFL players over the years 2014-2020
articles.contents:
The following data was pulled from the sportrac
website which gave access to every players salary going back to 2014. I
gathered that data and organized it into three categories, offense,
defense, and special team but some category (special teams) might have
less players than other category which is the reason it is a lot lower
than others. In conclusion I noticed that in the graph each category has
increased average salary over the years so we can predict in the future
that salaries of NFL players will keep increasing past 2020.

articles.title: Offensive Positions
articles.contents:
In this graph I put 5 of the most important positions in the
Offensive side because the others had very low average
or were not as important. The main reason why the average salary of
Quarterbacks compared to the other positions is a
tremendous amount is because quarterbacks require a ton of skills and
they are known as the leader for the offense category. In conclusion we
can estimate that the quarterback’s salary will keep increasing yearly
and the other positions will slowly increase behind. If you like to see
each player’s salary by year you can interact with the plot below.

articles.title: Special Teams Positions
articles.contents:
The Special Teams only has 3 positions which are
essential for the team to succeed. The reason why they are the lowest
paid out of the three category is because they play for a short amount
of time of the game. Long snapper is the lowest paid
position in all positions, the average is less than a million. If you
like to see each player’s salary by year you can interact with the plot
below.
